sql:
SELECT * 
FROM students 
WHERE is_active = 0 
  AND is_highschool = 1 
  AND speaks_english = 1 
  AND grade_english_pass = 1 
  AND (grade_math_pass = 0 OR grade_science_pass = 0);
SELECT * FROM students WHERE first_name = 'Olivia' AND is_active = 1;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE first_name = 'Olivia' AND last_name = 'Hudson';

SELECT * FROM students 
WHERE first_name = 'Olivia' AND last_name = 'Hudson' AND is_active = 1;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE first_name = 'Olivia' AND last_name = 'Hudson';

SELECT first_name, last_name 
FROM students 
WHERE speaks_english = 1 
  AND grade_english_pass = 1 
  AND is_active = 1 
  AND is_highschool = 1;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE first_name = 'Olivia' AND last_name = 'Hudson';
SELECT * FROM students WHERE first_name = 'Olivia' AND last_name = 'Hudson';

SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name 
FROM students 
WHERE is_active = 1 
AND (grade_math_pass = 0 OR grade_science_pass = 0 OR grade_english_pass = 0);

SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name 
FROM students 
WHERE is_active = 1 
AND (grade_math_pass = 1 OR grade_science_pass = 1 OR grade_english_pass = 1) 
AND (speaks_english = 1 OR speaks_spanish = 1);

SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name, 
       CASE 
           WHEN grade_math_pass = 1 AND grade_science_pass = 1 AND grade_english_pass = 1 THEN 'High Performer'
           WHEN grade_math_pass = 0 OR grade_science_pass = 0 OR grade_english_pass = 0 THEN 'Needs Support'
           ELSE 'Average Performer'
       END AS performance_category
FROM students
WHERE is_active = 1;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE is_active = 1 AND (grade_math_pass = 0 OR grade_science_pass = 0 OR grade_english_pass = 0);

SELECT first_name, last_name 
FROM students 
WHERE is_active = 1 
  AND (speaks_english = 1 OR speaks_spanish = 1) 
  AND (grade_math_pass = 1 AND grade_science_pass = 1 AND grade_english_pass = 1) 
  AND is_highschool = 1;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE is_active = 1 AND (speaks_english = 1 OR speaks_spanish = 1) AND (grade_math_pass = 1 OR grade_science_pass = 1 OR grade_english_pass = 1);
SELECT * FROM students WHERE is_active = 1 AND (speaks_english = 1 OR speaks_spanish = 1);
SELECT * FROM students WHERE is_active = 1 AND (speaks_english = 1 OR speaks_spanish = 1) AND (grade_math_pass = 1 OR grade_science_pass = 1 OR grade_english_pass = 1);
SELECT * FROM students WHERE is_active = 1 AND (grade_math_pass = 1 OR grade_science_pass = 1 OR grade_english_pass = 1);

SELECT first_name, last_name 
FROM students 
WHERE is_active = 1 
AND (speaks_english = 1 OR speaks_spanish = 1) 
AND (grade_math_pass = 1 AND grade_science_pass = 1 AND grade_english_pass = 1);
SELECT * FROM students WHERE is_active = 1 AND (speaks_english = 1 OR speaks_spanish = 1);

SELECT 
    COUNT(*) AS "Current_Value"
FROM 
    students
WHERE 
    is_active = 1 AND 
    (speaks_english = 1 OR speaks_spanish = 1) AND 
    (grade_math_pass = 1 OR grade_science_pass = 1 OR grade_english_pass = 1);

SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_students,
       SUM(speaks_english) AS english_speakers,
       SUM(speaks_spanish) AS spanish_speakers,
       SUM(grade_math_pass) AS math_passers,
       SUM(grade_science_pass) AS science_passers,
       SUM(grade_english_pass) AS english_passers,
       SUM(is_highschool) AS highschool_students,
       SUM(is_active) AS active_students
FROM students;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE is_active = 1 AND is_highschool = 1;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE is_active = 1 AND (grade_math_pass = 1 OR grade_science_pass = 1 OR grade_english_pass = 1);
SELECT * FROM students WHERE is_active = 1 AND (speaks_english = 1 OR speaks_spanish = 1) AND (grade_math_pass = 1 OR grade_science_pass = 1 OR grade_english_pass = 1);
